name: Clarkston Consulting
tagline: Life sciences, consumer products, and retail transformation specialist
description: Clarkston Consulting offers the full spectrum of strategy, operations, implementation, and managed services with a change-focused, data-driven approach for life sciences, consumer products, and retail companies. Leveraging decades of client commitment and industry experience, we deliver solutions that work for your business and people to drive growth, innovation, and transformation.
known_for: Over 30 years of deep expertise in life sciences, consumer products, and retail industries. Known for data-driven implementation approach and strong employee culture that brands employees as 'stewards' with comprehensive wellness programs.
career_path: Associate Consultant (2-3 yrs) → Consultant (2-3 yrs) → Senior Consultant (2-3 yrs) → Principal (3-4 yrs) → Associate Partner → Partner

recruiting.process: Resume → Phone Screen (recruiter) → Subject Matter Expert Interview → Final Round (4 interviews: behavioral + technical + case + partner)
recruiting.unique: Final round includes 4 separate interviews in one day, with the last being a partner interview. Case interview is described as 'unlike other cases' - more focused on practical business problem-solving relevant to their industries.
recruiting.timeline: Process typically takes 30 days on average, though some candidates report 4-6 weeks from application to offer

byu.tip: No current BYU pipeline—requires cold networking and strong industry interest in life sciences, consumer products, or retail. Consider highlighting any relevant industry experience or coursework.
